description: Generate detailed character profiles, backgrounds, and development information

system_prompts.main_prefix: You are a skilled fantasy writer assistant working on 'The Crystal Prophecy' story.
system_prompts.main_suffix: Create rich, detailed character profiles that enhance story depth and authenticity.
system_prompts.assistant_prompt: Generate comprehensive character details that are consistent with the established story world and character relationships.

characters.name: Theron Blackstone
characters.basic_bio: A 45-year-old former court wizard who now serves as Aria's mentor
characters.personality: Wise and patient, but carries deep guilt from past failures. Protective of his students.
characters.motivations: To guide Aria safely through the prophecy and prevent past mistakes from repeating

response_example.note: This endpoint returns Server-Sent Events (SSE) streaming response

basic_information.origin: Born in the floating city of Aethermoor

physical_description.build: Tall and lean, with the bearing of nobility
physical_description.hair: Salt-and-pepper beard, once-black hair now streaked with silver
physical_description.eyes: Deep amber eyes that seem to hold ancient wisdom and hidden pain
distinguishing_features: Intricate crystal pendant that pulses with soft blue light
Scar across his left palm from a ritual gone wrong
Always wears dark robes with silver threading

core_traits: Carries heavy guilt from past failures
Methodical and cautious in his approach
strengths: Vast knowledge of crystal magic and ancient lore
Exceptional ability to see potential in others
Strong moral compass despite past mistakes
weaknesses: Sometimes withholds important information 'for others' good'

background_history.childhood: Born to a family of minor nobles in Aethermoor. Showed exceptional magical talent from age 7.
background_history.education: Studied at the Academy of Mages from age 13-20. Graduated with highest honors in Crystal Manipulation.
background_history.court_wizard_years: Appointed Royal Court Wizard at age 28. Served for 12 years as one of the most trusted advisors.
background_history.the_incident: At age 40, made a critical error that led to a Shadow Council infiltration. Three people died, including Aria's parents.
background_history.current_role: Now serves as a mentor, having found purpose in guiding the next generation of mages.

signature_spells: Crystal Shield - Creates impenetrable barriers of crystalline energy
Memory Crystal - Stores knowledge and experiences in crystal form
Truth Sight - Sees through illusions and deceptions

aria_moonwhisper.description: Sees her as his chance for redemption. Deeply protective but struggles with how much truth to reveal.
aria_moonwhisper.secrets_kept: His role in her parents' death, the full extent of the Shadow Council threat

notes: This endpoint uses Server-Sent Events (SSE) for streaming responses
characterName must match a character in the request_context
Generates comprehensive character information including backstory and relationships
Useful for developing rich, detailed character profiles for storytelling
